document.full_text: followers of moktada al-sadr, the anti-american shiite cleric who spends most of his time in iran, staged their own public display of anti-americanism through a photo exhibition in the lobby of parliament.
document.title: at war: sadrists' anti-american photo exhibit
lines_and_colors: followers of moktada al-sadr, the anti-american shiite cleric who spends most of his time in iran, staged their own public display of anti-americanism through a photo exhibition in the lobby of parliament.
